title: Infantry Watchface
summary: Infantry Watchface is an army inspired watch style.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Infantry Watchface is an army inspired watch style. If you wanted a cool army shock proof watch style then here it is. It is designed in multiple camouflage colors to give you a feel like an army solider. With a beautifully designed interface this watch is the next big thing on your smart watch.It has all the important updates that you require to stay updated. It displays time, date and day. Alongside it displays weather signs, temperature count and watch battery. Watch360 Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Watch battery indicator.• Weather icons and temperature count.• Digital military camouflage design.• Faster recognition with numbers and icons.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
descriptionHTML:
Infantry Watchface is an army inspired watch style. If you wanted a cool army shock proof watch style then here it is. It is designed in multiple camouflage colors to give you a feel like an army solider. With a beautifully designed interface this watch is the next big thing on your smart watch.
It has all the important updates that you require to stay updated. It displays time, date and day. Alongside it displays weather signs, temperature count and watch battery.
Watch360 Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Watch battery indicator.
• Weather icons and temperature count.
• Digital military camouflage design.
• Faster recognition with numbers and icons.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
comments: not working paid for pro,  and every time I try to use it and make adjustments to the settings it just asks me to pay for pro again?
bought the pro version and it doesn't work don't waste your money or rime
